How to play BedWars:

If you've played SkyWars before, you'll pickup BedWars in no time!","genre":""},{"creatorId":3194064,"creatorName":"Bizarre Studios®","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":579628,"totalDownVotes":62013,"universeId":1016936714,"name":"『NEW UPDATE』 Your Bizarre Adventure ","placeId":2809202155,"playerCount":58520,"imageToken":"T_2809202155_cd90","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"✨🏹『NEW UPDATE v0.88』 🏹✨

Welcome to Your Bizarre Adventure, an RPG-styled game that revolves around obtaining strong and unique spiritual abilities known as "STANDS", fighting gangs, and more! Read the help section in-game! JOIN OUR COMMUNITY'S SERVER LINK BELOW FOR CODES, UPDATES, ANNOUNCEMENTS, AND MORE HELP!

Arrivederci!","genre":""},{"creatorId":1848960,"creatorName":"Nikilis","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":4364730,"totalDownVotes":369042,"universeId":66654135,"name":"Murder Mystery 2","placeId":142823291,"playerCount":131296,"imageToken":"T_142823291_8b7a","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Can you solve the Mystery and survive each round?

MURDERER: Eliminate EVERYONE. Don't get shot by the sheriff.

Collect and trade hundreds of knives! 
 
Twitter: @NikilisRBX

Like, follow, and subscribe for exclusive update news, free knife codes, and more!","genre":""},{"creatorId":3959677,"creatorName":"BIG Games Simulators","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":460707,"totalDownVotes":23002,"universeId":2316994223,"name":"🔥 HELL! 🔔 Follow for game updates! 🔔","genre":""},{"creatorId":4372130,"creatorName":"go play eclipsis","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":923012,"totalDownVotes":65557,"universeId":994732206,"name":"[UPDATE 14] Blox Fruits","placeId":2753915549,"playerCount":95484,"imageToken":"T_2753915549_8271","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🔵🔴 UPDATE 14 OUT NOW! 🔴🔵
Rumble Awakening + Island + Cyborg ++ MORE!

Welcome to Blox Fruits! Become a master swordsman or a powerful blox fruit user as you train to become the strongest player to ever live. You can choose to fight against tough enemies or have powerful boss battles while sailing across the ocean to find hidden secrets. 

Current level cap: 1525
Current fruits in the game:
Bomb, Spike, Chop, Spring, Smoke, Flame, Ice, Sand, Dark, Light, Magma, Rubber, Quake, Human Buddha, Barrier String, Bird Phoenix, Rumble, Paw, Gravity, Dough, Control, and Dragon!
FAQ:
- Fruits spawn in the map every hour / despawn after 20. 
- You can buy fruits from the Blox Fruits Dealer. He restocks random fruits every 4 hours 
- More info in the group description

Do not exploit or auto farm, our auto-detection will catch you and we do not appeal our bans.","genre":""},{"creatorId":5449496,"creatorName":"Lyte Interactive","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1085008,"totalDownVotes":95992,"universeId":2404080894,"name":"{LITTLE MAN} Funky Friday","placeId":6447798030,"playerCount":52818,"imageToken":"T_6447798030_4d91","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"beat box battle

(LIVE)✅
🌊Surprise Monstercat Event! (LIVE)✅
🌊 Wave 2: Quests (LIVE)✅
🌊 Wave 3: Fair Pier ☐

Welcome to Royale High, your ever-growing dream world!
✧~♡~✧
♡Use your Teleportation Sceptre to fast-travel across magical lands, with secrets to explore & fun games to play!
♡Games earn you the valuable currency 💎Diamonds, increases your level, & challenges your knowledge and skills!
♡Spend your diamonds in the shop, which sells special items during real-life seasons.
♡Dress your character to suit your mood & personality~ free makeup, hairstyles, & thousands of unique outfits for any occasion!
♡Level up at Royale High School by attending classes! The higher grades you receive, the more rewards you earn!
♡Make sure to bring the right book to class from your locker, and turn in your completed homework!
♡Try to balance your studies and socializing, as many best friends have been made within these halls♡","genre":""},{"creatorId":2613928,"creatorName":"ROLVe Community","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":3241269,"totalDownVotes":420246,"universeId":111958650,"name":"Arsenal","placeId":286090429,"playerCount":28925,"imageToken":"T_286090429_76fe","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Race to the top through a massive Arsenal of weapons!

And join our Roblox group/community!","genre":""},{"creatorId":6639766,"creatorName":"Century Makers","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":350260,"totalDownVotes":37353,"universeId":2549475383,"name":"[Voyage!] ⛵Livetopia","placeId":6737970321,"playerCount":80791,"imageToken":"T_6737970321_b832","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"____💡 UPDATE 18 💡____

🐱 Play with unique pets! Aren't they cute??

👍 300k likes to unlock Sea Princess Outfit! (Unlocked)

👍 400k likes to unlock the Panda Outfit!","genre":""},{"creatorId":5202664,"creatorName":"BlockZone","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1155574,"totalDownVotes":60380,"universeId":1348402608,"name":"DUNGEONS!🏯 Anime Fighting Simulator","placeId":4042427666,"playerCount":24806,"imageToken":"T_4042427666_fd51","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Anime Fighting Simulator is a training game inspired by multiple popular Anime shows.

","genre":""},{"creatorId":4217910,"creatorName":"YXCeptional Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":2538462,"totalDownVotes":765601,"universeId":703124385,"name":"Tower of Hell","placeId":1962086868,"playerCount":61188,"imageToken":"T_1962086868_5fcb","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Can you be the first to the top in this randomly generated obby with absolutely no checkpoints at all?

For support go to support.yx.zone","genre":""},{"creatorId":4698921,"creatorName":"Da Hood Entertainment","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":412172,"totalDownVotes":209513,"universeId":1008451066,"name":"Da Hood","placeId":2788229376,"playerCount":26858,"imageToken":"T_2788229376_aeaa","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"A difficult game, read below for tips.
Account has to be at least 10 days to play.

[PC/XBOX Controls][F/ButtonY - Block][E/PadDown - Stomp][G/PadUp - Carry][LCTRL+ButtonB - Crouch]
Crouch+Carry = Ragdoll thrown.
You can weave 100% if you time at the right time when blocking.

To gain muscle buy weights at fitness.
Eat lettuce to reduce muscle.

Cop: To join cops go to the police station, if you execute anyone without cuffs you'll be automatically kicked off. Use cuffs instead.

Criminals: Ransack banks and several others small time shops in order to gain wanted or cash.

Gun saves - however, can be lost by death, or logging when KO, or 0 ammo.

cash drop takes 30%

Game-Commands: "/e stats"","genre":""},{"creatorId":3059674,"creatorName":"Badimo","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":4572008,"totalDownVotes":619860,"universeId":245662005,"name":"Jailbreak! [Season 5!]","placeId":606849621,"playerCount":23480,"imageToken":"T_606849621_25a8","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Our next few updates are focused on squashing bugs and glitches and adding amazing new vehicle variety for ALL. Stay tuned!

🎉 SEASON 5 is here! Let the memes begin!
- BANANA CAR. Yes.

- WEAPON RACKS and working vending machines!
- FIVE new interiors for the Camaro, SWAT, Celestial, Pickup, and the free Heli!
Plus a host of small changes like additional garage saves! Enjoy!

🏆 Jailbreak is an award-winning game played over five billion times where you can orchestrate a robbery or stop the criminals before they get away! Team up with friends for even more fun and plan the ultimate raid or heist. What role will you play? 

🖥 Programmed by Badcc. @badccvoid
🎨 Designed by asimo3089.  @asimo3089","genre":""},{"creatorId":2782840,"creatorName":"Chillz Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1658147,"totalDownVotes":135079,"universeId":210851291,"name":"Build A Boat For Treasure","placeId":537413528,"playerCount":34548,"imageToken":"T_537413528_d6fc","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Build your ship and set sail for your adventure!
